overview:
Frank Chiera is an innovative and creative marketing thought leader specializing in the creation of strategic online and offline business-building programs for premier consumer and high-tech brands.

In his current role, Chiera leads franchise and specialty retail social media integration for Kel & Partners, a leading Web 2.0 marketing & public relations agency for consumer & emerging technology brands.

Chiera has successfully developed marketing programs for and with major consumer brand powerhouses like: Yankee Candle Company, Ace Hardware, Disney Pixar, Carpet One Floor & Home (part of the $9 billion CCA Global Partners network of specialty retail stores) and Zappos.com.

Chiera is a savvy, results-oriented professional with 15+ years of agency and client-side expertise creating and implementing customer-centric integrated marketing programs for worldwide organizations.

He possesses a unique combination of right-brained creativity and left-brained analytic thinking; passionate about generating incremental revenue and profits; astute problem-solving abilities; and a talent for directing teams and enabling change.
